creditline: Gift of funds from Ellen and Sheldon Sturgis, Richard and Roberta Simmons, and The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panel huipil with round cut neck opening; satin appliqué surrounds neck with embroidered foliage radiating from circle; bands of multi-colored geometric designs cover the garment, primarily chevrons and diamond motifs.
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery, appliqué
title: Woman's wedding blouse (Huipil)
